text: hey what's up guys binging with babish
here coming at you with a little
announcement a day before your regularly
scheduled programming I'm very excited
to announce that tomorrow my first book
eat when you watch a cookbook for movie
lovers is hitting the shelves this
delightful 132 page romp through the
foods of fiction features fantastic
photography fanciful FETs film
fanaticism and many other f-words
not that one of other ones it features
some of the favorite recipes from the
show as well as endearing tributes to
the great moments of food in movies
today is the last day to pre-order the
book and every pre-order will
automatically be entered to win an
autographed copy with a pithy
contribution from yours truly along with
your very own official apron emblazoned
with the binging with babish logo here's
an artist's rendition of what that might
look like thank you so much for your
support guys I'm looking forward to
meeting more of you at book signings
barbecues bar mitzvahs and other b-words
not that one other ones
[Music]
you
